columns.name: THREAD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the thread record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: AUDIENCE_USER_ID
columns.description: MyChart conversation audiences are where the messages that patients send go. These are the users who are the audience of a conversation.

columns.name: AUDIENCE_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: AUDIENCE_DEPARTMENT_ID
columns.description: MyChart conversation audiences are where the messages that patients send go. These are the departments who are the audience of a conversation.

columns.name: AUDIENCE_DISPLAY_NAME
columns.description: MyChart conversation audiences are where the messages that patients send go. This is the display name for the corresponding audience pool, user or department.

columns.name: AUDIENCE_PROV_ID
columns.description: MyChart conversation audiences are where the messages that patients send go. These are providers who are the audience of a conversation.
